channel.title: Music Of Loving It!
channel.description:
A podcast dedicated to a wide variety of music from down the years...for your listening and grooving pleasure! Whether it's tunes for the car, a mix for a party or chilling, "laid back in the shack", I hope there is something for everyone's taste in my selections...
Tune in for a regular dose of Loving It!!!
channel.itunes:author: Matthew Biant
channel.itunes:summary:
A podcast dedicated to a wide variety of music from down the years...for your listening and grooving pleasure! Whether it's tunes for the car, a mix for a party or chilling, "laid back in the shack", I hope there is something for everyone's taste in my selections...
Tune in for a regular dose of Loving It!!!

item.title: #99 80s Magic (with a bit of 70s!)
item.description:
Samantha Sang - Emotion
Hall & Oates - Maneater
Toto - Africa
Michael MacDonald - I Keep Forgettin'
Double - Captain Of The Heart
Level 42 - Something About You
Five Star - Can't Wait Another Minute
Madonna - Lucky Star
Scritti Politti - Wood Beez (Pray Like Aretha Franklin)
Diana Ross - My Old Piano
Christopher Cross - Ride Like The Wind
Culture Club - Miss Me Blind
The Steve Miller Band - Abracadabra

This should bring some memories back....some may call it magic, others call it crap, either way I love it!

If you would like to subscribe to this podcast (totally free) using iTunes, please click HERE

Check out further episodes from this podcast HERE

item.title: #83 Between The Sheets
item.description:
Bobby Brown - Rock Wit'cha
Donald Byrd & 125th Street - I Feel Like Loving You Today
Curiosity Killed The Cat - Red Lights
Phylis Nelson - Move Closer
Alexander O'Neal - If You Were Here Tonight
Mary J Blige - Everything
Earth, Wind & Fire - That's The Way Of The World
Deniece Williams - Free
Teddy Pendergrass - Close The Door
The Isley Brothers - Between The Sheets
The Style Council - You're The Best Thing

Something a bit more soulful this time around, and with Valentine's just round the corner, please forgive my indulgence! I know this mix won't be to everyone's taste, but these tracks are from some of my favorite artists of all time, and through the years they have been the soundtrack!

Agree or disagree, this one goes out to the one I love...without whom, this life would not be the same :)

If you would like to subscribe to this podcast (totally free) using iTunes, please click HERE

Check out further episodes from this podcast HERE

Something a bit more soulful this time around, and with Valentine's just round the corner, please forgive my indulgence! I know this mix won't be to everyone's taste, but these tracks are from some of my favorite artists of all time, and through the years they have been the soundtrack!

item.title: #81 Melodies Of Love
item.description:
Ooh Child (Anthony Mansfield Drunkstep Edit)
Cole Medina - 4 Your Love (Eddie C Mix)
Pink Rhythm - Melodies Of Love (Rhythm Method Re-edit)
Dead Rose Music Company - The World Is An Uproar
Dexter Wansel - The Sweetest Pain (Ooft Edit)
Linda Clifford - Don't Give Up (InnerWestSoul One Trick Pony Edit)
Sound Advice - Keep On Getting Up (Frankie Rodriquez Keeps On Cutting Up Remix)
Cecile - Sweetness 86
The Beatdown Soundmachine - More Love (LTJ X-perience Mix)

After such a hectic year so far at work this is just what I need to unwind....some lovely laid back, soulful tunes, including a monster Rhythm Method rework of the mid 80s Pink Rhythm classic, "Melodies Of Love" and the splendid "The World Is An Uproar" by the Dead Rose Music Company.

Sit back, relax and enjoy...

If you are enjoying this podcast I'd love to hear from you, please add your comments to the episodes, shoot me an email (djlebant@gmail.com), or participate in the poll on the right hand-side of this podcast to let me know what music you would like to hear more of...

If you would like to subscribe to this podcast (totally free) using iTunes, please click HERE

Check out further episodes from this podcast HERE

item.title: #79 Afrodizzy
item.description:
Sally Shapiro - Jackie Jackie (Junior Boys Dub)

item.description:

Barry White - Never Give You Up (Andy Ash Version)
LL Cool J - Hey Lover (NoRequests Dubbed Edit)
Michoacan - In The Dark Of Night
No Requests - Jonesin' For You
? - Mine
Craig Bratley - Birdshell (6th Borough Project Shell Toe Mix)
The Chi-Lites - Inner City Blues (M.K. Edit)
Trickski - Pill Collins

A slow mo mix including the absolutely superb "And Then We Realise" from Eltron John...can't get that one out of my head at the moment! Thanks to all the editors for their contributions, and if anyone can identify the "Mine" edit, please let me know...:)

item.itunes:summary:
William De Vaughn - Thankful For My Gangsta Lean (No Requests Edit) Indeep - The Record Keeps Spinning (No Requests Nothing Changes Edit) Notorious B.I.G. - I Love Biggie More (No Requests Edit) Michael MacDonald - I Keep Forgetting (AC Re-Edit) Yasuko Agawa - LA Night (Jimmy The Twin Edit) Roy Ayers - Running Away (The Noodleman Rework) Hall & Oates - I Can Go For That (Pop Out Play's Re-Edit) Touch Sensitive - Body Stop ? - Let Your Body (Rayko Rainbow Edit) Maysa - Come On Over To My Place (byDesign Edit)
Thanks to all in the SoundCloud community for most of the tracks in this episode. Great stuff!
If you are enjoying this podcast I'd love to hear from you, please add your comments to the episodes, shoot me an email (djlebant@gmail.com), or participate in the poll on the right hand-side of this podcast to let me know what music you would like to hear more of...
If you would like to subscribe to this podcast (totally free) using iTunes, please click HERE

item.title: #54 Alright My Lovers
item.description:
"This one goes out to all the lovers in the house"

Luther Vandross - Always & Forever
George Michael - A Different Corner
Spandau Ballet - True
Chicago - If You Leave Me Now
Minnie Ripperton - Lovin' You
Rose Royce - Wishing On A Star
10CC - I'm Not In Love
Earth, Wind & Fire - After The Love Has Gone
Stevie Wonder - You Are The Sunshine Of My Life
Chi-Lites - Oh Girl
Atlantic Starr - Always
Barry White - Just The Way You Are
Alexander O'Neal - If You Were Here Tonight
Grover Washington Jr. & Bill Withers - Just The Two Of Us

If you are enjoying this podcast I'd love to hear from you, please add your comments to the episodes, shoot me an email (djlebant@gmail.com), or participate in the poll on the right hand-side of this podcast to let me know what music you would like to hear more of...
